name: v25.11.0-trunk.190
body:
Armbian rolling releases


- rolling releases are available at the bottom of official download pages - How to change type of images that are provided by Armbian? - How to switch between stable and rolling release? Please note that Armbian Rolling Releases are not recommended for production environments, as these builds are not thoroughly tested. However, in most cases, they should work well.

Weekly Digest

  • add NanoPi R76S support for edge kernel builds. by @SuperKali in armbian/build#8609
  • armsom-sige5: add edge kernel support. by @amazingfate in armbian/build#8585
  • blobs: rk3576: update BL31 to v1.20 and DDR to v1.09. by @SuperKali in armbian/build#8596
  • board: armsom-sige5: fix typo in KERNEL_TARGET variable. by @SuperKali in armbian/build#8599
  • BSP: fix incorrect logging for USB Gadget script. by @leggewie in armbian/build#8601
  • Fix broken GitHub Action: Add Label When Approved. by @igorpecovnik in armbian/build#8620
  • Implement label removal on PR approval. by @igorpecovnik in armbian/build#8629
  • IMX8 kernel 6.12.y: fix to latest known version that compiles. by @igorpecovnik in armbian/build#8616
  • JetHome: update links and references for JetHome resources. by @adeepn in armbian/build#8610
  • kenrel makefile: use Makefile url from ghproxy github repo for mainli…. by @amazingfate in armbian/build#8597
  • PR review labeler: extract PR number from commit ID. by @igorpecovnik in armbian/build#8627
  • Re-Enable BeagleY As Supported and fix Wifi. by @Grippy98 in armbian/build#8625
  • Remove multiple labels on approve and adjust dependabot labels. by @igorpecovnik in armbian/build#8636
  • rk3576: update DDR_BLOB to v1.08. by @amazingfate in armbian/build#8600
  • rockchip64-edge: Add RK3576 thermal sensor support with OTP trim. by @SuperKali in armbian/build#8614
  • rtl8852bs: update to latest main branch commit. by @amazingfate in armbian/build#8595
  • rtw88: extend SDIO RF path fix to kernel 6.16. by @SuperKali in armbian/build#8608
  • uboot: set mainline uboot source with mirror. by @amazingfate in armbian/build#8598
